prod_desc: Speed into battle against the First Order forces!
prod_long_desc:
Journey to a far-off galaxy with the Resistance Trooper Battle Pack. This set features a speeder with space for 2 minifigures and a rotating stud shooter, plus 3 Resistance Troopers and a Resistance Officer, each with a stud blaster.
Includes 4 minifigures: 3 Resistance Troopers and a Resistance Officer.
Features a speeder with space for 2 minifigures and a rotating stud shooter.
Fire the stud shooter to repel the enemy.
Includes 4 stud blasters and extra stud shooter ammo.
Also includes 3 Resistance Trooper helmets.
Makes a great addition to any LEGO® Star Wars collection.
Measures over 2” high, 3” long and 2” wide.
